# First Level Header

```{r}
names <- c("Molly", "Duncan", "Cole", "Evan", "Qays", "Liv")
height <- c(64, 70, 68, 65, 71, 66)
DF <- data.frame(names = names, height = height)
rm(names, height)
str(DF)
mean(DF$height) -> answer
```

The average height for people in the fourth row is `r round(answer, 1)` inches.
